{{Marvel Database:Organization Template | Image = AccuTech (Earth-616) from Iron Man Vol 1 225 001.png | Name = [[AccuTech|AccuTech Research & Development]] | Aliases = | Leaders = [[Gilbert O'Conner (Earth-616)|Gilbert O'Conner]] | CurrentMembers = Carlos, Isaac | FormerMembers = [[Abraham Zimmer (Earth-616)|Abraham Zimmer]] | Identity = Public | Affiliation = | Allies = | Enemies = | Origin = | Reality = Earth-616 | Status = | BaseOfOperations = | PlaceOfFormation = | PlaceOfDissolution = | Creators = | First = | History = One of the small companies that form the ever-expanding web of [[Stark Industries|Stark Enterprises]], where [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Mr. Stark]] asked [[Abraham Zimmer (Earth-616)|Abe Zimmer]] to remove a file from Transcorp's database {{r|Iron Man Vol 1 225}}.
He later informed Mr. Stark that one of the names in the file was erased as they copied it, so Stark guessed it was [[Walter Newell (Earth-616)|Stingray]]{{r|Iron Man Vol 1 226}}.
Some days later, Zimmer was visited by Stark and [[James Rhodes (Earth-616)|Jim Rhodes]] to inject the tapeworm, a computer virus which will replicate itself in virtually every database in the world, erasing all data concerning the stolen Stark technology that was being used by terrorists, into the Transcorp database{{r|Iron Man Vol 1 230}}.
Days later, the S.E. subsidiary exploded, as [[Jack Taggert (Earth-616)|Firepower]] blew up a whole shipment{{r|Iron Man Vol 1 231}}. | Equipment = | Transportation = | Weapons = | Notes = | Trivia = | Links = }} [[Category:Stark Industries Subsidiaries]] [[Category:Companies]]
